d:
喜报！
Konoha Shinobi's Affair 4开始了！
估计没个一年半载完不了（悲）
另：e站默认压缩图片质量，且作者近期作品大多是横版的两页拼接，文字数量也很多，
在默认压缩倍率下可能会出现文字/图片模糊不清等情况，建议打开原图观看或直接下载。
—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Like always, I will only update the translated version after others have leaked the original version on e-hentai. This is to protect the creator's revenue, and I kindly ask for your understanding.
You can visit the creator's official website to support.
